A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi pushes the Star Wars series to a place it's never been. Unlike the Force Awakens\, which played it safe to bring people back into the series\, The Last Jedi takes risks that the series needed. Everyone who did not like this movie simply wants to see the old movies re-hashed over and over. The art\, emotion\, and power of this movie are second to none
